DOC.HEADLINE: A . ALEXANDROV ; LED SOVIET REACTOR PROGRAM
DOC.TEXT: Anatoly Alexandrov , who led the Soviet effort to develop nuclear_reactors such_as the one that exploded at Chernobyl in 1986 , died Thursday.He was 90 . Alexandrov was also instrumental in developing the Soviet nuclear-powered fleet . He was head of the Kurchatov Institute , Russia ' s primary nuclear research_center , and was president of the Soviet Academy of Sciences for 12 years .
